title: Joe investigates how vigorously the Group 2 elements react with water. He wants to find out if there is a trend in these reactions. What preliminary work does Joe could do before starting his investigation? - Quora

response.answer_text: He needs to decide what he will measure to decide if there is a trend. He must also identify the control variables.
Do up all the buttons on his lab coat and make sure everyone in the room (including him) his wearing well-secured safety glasses.
